channel.title: Port problem :O
channel.description:
Okay I've been hosting my server with Utorrent for a month and it was fine, then today I tried to put server online and it wouldn't work so I tested the port and it said it was closed (port 43594) I have no idea how to open this port again :/ Btw I don't have a router
Thanks to anyone who helps/trys

item.title: Port problem :O
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

If you don’t have a router you do not need to use UTorrent nor do you need to portforward; get a no-ip and run your server.

Just make sure you’ve opened up port 43594 in firewall.

Read full topic
